node.name: Jevon's Paradox
node.description: Efficiency increases result in usage increases.

node.name: Symbolic Paradox
node.description: Rich people pretend to be poor to fit in and poor people pretend to be rich to look cool.

node.name: Political Paradox
node.description: Any gain in coalition results in an accompanying loss in an incumbent faction of the coalition.

node.name: Puppet Paradox
node.description: Positions of authority more often than not have less authority than popularly realized.

node.name: Scapegoat Theory
node.description: When things get bad, the first person to be sacrificed is the prophet/founder.
